name: Miles Education
description: Miles Education is committed to revolutionizing the accounting industry! Our impactful initiatives bridge the global skills gap, showcasing the exceptional talent of Indian accountants on a worldwide stage. Through strategic partnerships with renowned institutions, public accounting firms, and corporations, we empower our professionals to work in India and the US, serving as flagbearer of Indian accounting talent and making significant contributions to the global accounting landscape.

enhanced_description: Miles Education is an HR technology provider specializing in learning and development, committed to bridging the global skills gap and revolutionizing industries. Operating as a training management and eLearning software, they focus on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency through adaptive and personalized learning experiences. Miles Education empowers professionals, particularly from India, to become future-ready in high-demand domains such as Accounting, Business, and Healthcare, serving as a flagbearer for global talent. Through strategic partnerships with over 100 universities and 600+ MNCs and corporations, they create unique pathways to address talent shortages and facilitate professional contributions to the global workforce, especially in the US.
